Sentencas: The solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) may suffer structural damage even performance degradation caused by large temperature gradient at high temperature.
Titulo: Design of novel flow channels of tubular biomass-syngas fueled SOFC towards uniform temperature distribution

Sentencas: Therefore, it is necessary to implement thermal management of SOFC to keep temperature gradients within safe limits.
Titulo: Design of novel flow channels of tubular biomass-syngas fueled SOFC towards uniform temperature distribution

Sentencas: In such context, this work designs three novel flow channels and investigates their effects on SOFC temperature distribution characteristics and electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Design of novel flow channels of tubular biomass-syngas fueled SOFC towards uniform temperature distribution

Sentencas: Three novel flow channels with semicircular, rectangular and trapezoidal disturbances are considered.
Titulo: Design of novel flow channels of tubular biomass-syngas fueled SOFC towards uniform temperature distribution

Sentencas: It was found that the temperature gradient and maximum temperature can be decreased to a certain extent by setting the disturbance within the flow channel.
Titulo: Design of novel flow channels of tubular biomass-syngas fueled SOFC towards uniform temperature distribution

Sentencas: Moreover, the rectangular disturbance is better than semicircular disturbance and trapezoidal disturbance in reducing temperature gradient.
Titulo: Design of novel flow channels of tubular biomass-syngas fueled SOFC towards uniform temperature distribution

Sentencas: The maximum temperature and temperature gradient of the cell could be reduced from 880 degrees C to 840 degrees C and 24 K/cm to 12 K/cm, respectively by using rectangular disturbance.
Titulo: Design of novel flow channels of tubular biomass-syngas fueled SOFC towards uniform temperature distribution

Sentencas: In the region with a large temperature gradient, increasing the disturbance depth can decrease the temperature gradient more effectively.
Titulo: Design of novel flow channels of tubular biomass-syngas fueled SOFC towards uniform temperature distribution

Sentencas: However, around the region with a small temperature gradient, increasing the disturbance depth results in a large temperature gradient reversely.
Titulo: Design of novel flow channels of tubular biomass-syngas fueled SOFC towards uniform temperature distribution

Sentencas: Moreover, increasing the disturbance depth also reduces the output current density and causes the increase of channel pressure drop.
Titulo: Design of novel flow channels of tubular biomass-syngas fueled SOFC towards uniform temperature distribution

Sentencas: It is suggested to increase the depth of local disturbance where the temperature gradient is large and to reduce the depth of local disturbance where the temperature gradient is already small.
Titulo: Design of novel flow channels of tubular biomass-syngas fueled SOFC towards uniform temperature distribution

Sentencas: By comparison with the decrease of channel thickness, the internal disturbance structure is beneficial to decrease temperature gradient when the air inlet flow rate is kept a constant.
Titulo: Design of novel flow channels of tubular biomass-syngas fueled SOFC towards uniform temperature distribution
